title: When the Modem  is connected to  computer, there is a “!” at the mass storage.
answer:
1) Unplug the modem when CD-Rom is running, plug it again may has the “!”(especially windows2000)
? Unplug the modem, wait for 5 seconds, and then re-plug.
? If fail, unplug the modem and reboot computer, then re-plug the modem.
2) Conflict with the CD-ROM drive.
? Make a test with the latest firmware.
? Uninstall the virtual CD-ROM, or update the firmware by the latest one.
